website_summaries.verdict: Although this egg incubator is a little more expensive, you’re paying for the perks that come with a larger egg capacity, automatic egg turning, and premium air circulation that the iTavah provides.
cons: The tinted plastic makes it difficult to see inside of the incubator, and you may have to open it several times to check in on the eggs

customer_reviews.title: This is so much better! No worrying about temperature
customer_reviews.text: In 25 years, I have used many different incubators, usually of the styrofam persuasion, with and without digital thermometers, fans, turners, etc.This is so much better! No worrying about temperature, since it nailed it first time and has maintained it throughout. I will buy three of these before I buy a styrofoam one again. I lost a lot of eggs and chicks due to incorrect temp, fluctuations, humidity changes, etc. It is worth it to know that if an egg is viable, I can hatch it now.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hummer

customer_reviews.title: Worked well. No issues.
customer_reviews.text: Worked well. Easy to use. I bought a digital humidity gauge that I propped in the window. One helpful thing: I placed a styrofoam cooler over the unit, with a gap between the counter and the styrofoam (to let in air). This stabilized the temperature and maintained the humidity. This is the same model sold under several different names. I bought the least expensive one.
customer_reviews.author: MrSporks

customer_reviews.title: Hatched delicate, difficult Serama Chicks!
customer_reviews.text: This incubator worked great! It was my first time hatching Seramas and everything I read stated how difficult they are to hatch, so I didn’t expect success. But to my pleasant surprise all but one hatched! The incubator kept the humidity and temperature in the perfect range and it saw them all the way to the fluff stage beautifully! I would give it 5 stars, but the instructions are quite aweful, terrible English translation. Also, the temperature is in Celsius so having the option of farenheight would be nice. But very happy with the performance once I figured out how to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Awesome

customer_reviews.title: It worked great.
customer_reviews.text: It worked fine, we were able to incubate chicken and duck eggs. My only complaint is that the instructions on the actual incubation periods and specifics could have been a little more clear, it was almost as if they were not written by someone who spoke English well. I was able to do some online searches and found the information we needed.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for incubating duck eggs
customer_reviews.text: My first time to ever try to incubate duck eggs and with this incubator I had four out of six Rouen ducklings hatch. I simply added a small amount of water each day, sprayed the eggs with water during the third week, added a soaked sponge at the first sign of pipping, and followed directions I found online since the written directions that come with this outfit is not all you need to know for hatching duck eggs.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Dutton

customer_reviews.title: Poor Assembly,Instructions very confusing,tried to incubate the first batch of eggs incubated,
customer_reviews.text: I DIONT LIKE THIS PRIDUCT..AND BECAUSE THE POOR QUALITY ASSEMBLY AND THE VERY CONFUSING INSTRUCTIONS IN HOW TO ASSEMBLE I WILL NOT RECOMEND THIS EGG INCUBATOR. THE EGG TURNING RACK IS VERY, VERY TIGHT, I MEASURE JUST A REGULAR EGG AND IT WAS VERY TIGHT..IT DOES NOT TURN THE EGGS, AND MY FIRST BATCH OF EGGS DIS NOT ENCUBATE, INSTTRUCTION ON HOW TO ASSEMBLE IT IS A VERY POOR AND CONFUSING QUALITY, I HOPE THE SELLER OR AMAZON WILL MAKE IT UP TO SOOTH MY CONFUSION, TIME CONSUMMED AND THE DISSAPOINTMENT OF THIS ITEM AND FRUSTRATION. IT DOES NOT WORK, AND IS NOT WORTH ANYTHING DECEIVED ADVERTISEMWNT.
customer_reviews.author: Raul Chavez

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up!  Strongly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Day 21 and woke up to the best Valentines Day Gift ever! Easy to set up. Easy to use. I did buy a humidity reader and a couple of times had to add water earlier than book stated. But super simple and super happy. Hopefully we will have the other 4 eggs hatch later today or tomorrow.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! We have ducks now!
customer_reviews.text: I sent this to a friend that was trying to hatch and raise some ducks. Previously, she has used a heat lamp and towels and was not having much luck. Thanks to this handy-dandy device, she has successfully hatch and 4 ducks all at the same time! She loved the ability to see inside and control it. Quackie Chan, Duck Norris, Sherduck Holmes, and Darkwing Duck truly appreciate this device and look forward to gaining more siblings from this wonderful incubator.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa M.

customer_reviews.title: Works 100% as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Used for quail and it worked perfectly. The self Turner works. Even if you cant see it move, it does, very slowly. Worked fantastic for me.
customer_reviews.author: Mason Carlton

customer_reviews.title: INCREDIBLY DIFFICULT WITH NO SUCESS!!
customer_reviews.text: This product did not work for me at all!! There were no directions. I hade to go on You Tube to find out how to set it. Then, all of my 9 eggs did not hatch!! Six were fertile. I checked after the time for hatching passed. They had just started to grow in the eggs. What a shame! Of course once you try to hatch your time to return has run out. So there isn’t a return of you are hatching out chicks just if you don’t like it when it comes in. I have an old styrofoam incubator that has hatched out chicks for years. I wanted one with an automatic turner. DON’T WASTE YOUR MONEY!!!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Really a neat little incubator!!
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: we hatched one baby so far!! Healthy sweet little baby!!! Amazing product!! So far!!!! Awesome! The instructions were very in clear but if you YouTube, some great videos are there to help set it up!! ! I put 9 eggs in and only 4 were fertile! These were candeled at day 5... we had some great spider webs forming and clear little babies in there !!!
customer_reviews.author: Bree R

customer_reviews.title: This worked great for my chicken eggs
customer_reviews.text: This worked great for my chicken eggs. Although the turner aly has room for 9 chicken eggs, I was able to have successful hatches. The small size also helps in better temperature control. I have added a bigger incubator and mostly use this now for the ones who are hatching. Being plastic, its easy to clean up.
customer_reviews.author: Scott V. Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for first time incubating
customer_reviews.text: When I purchased this product, I was both excited and nervous as it would be the first time I hatch chicks. Needless to say, I've hatched 2 batches of chicks!! This is perfect for someone who is new to incubating eggs.
customer_reviews.author: Jaki

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It came with bird feathers and poop in it!!! WTF. Later: After 20 days, it killed 7/9 eggs. And of the 2 surviving, in the hatching stage the device that rotates (your cant take it off during hatching) knocked into a hatching chick and killed it... Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: AE

customer_reviews.title: Nice product, is as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Nice product, is as advertised. The directions are not written well and need to be re-written. Otherwise a fine product, packaged well and arrived quickly. would use this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 8 out of 9 hatched!
customer_reviews.text: 8 chicks out of 9 eggs hatched! This is a super easy incubator that only needs for you to add water once or twice a day. The temperature and humidity were obviously perfect because I just got eight chicks out of nine eggs that I set to incubate. It’s very easy to clean up too. It is not ideal for viewing chicks hatching however. If you want an educational incubator this is not the best although you can see through the side enough to tell that chicks have hatched and are dry.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny A

customer_reviews.title: Hard to keep the humidity within rang
customer_reviews.text: For dry states it’s just too hard to keep the humidity up unless you’re going to stay up all night adding water/monitoring. We will get a new one with auto humidity control.
customer_reviews.author: missy

customer_reviews.title: Great value. Small size. No issues
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time incubating eggs but so far this has been a great unit. It was a good price when i purchased it and so far have had no issues. It holds the temperature perfectly and does a good job of continuously rotating the eggs. I would recommend buying a small humid meter so you can monitor that. I was able to fit 25 quail eggs in this unit! I will update once we have chicks hatched in 8 more days.
customer_reviews.author: Mmommie

customer_reviews.title: Hard to understand
customer_reviews.text: The product has been great so far but I had to watch a youtube video to understand how it works but the instruction booklet is hard to follow. It's like someone translated it from another language and didn't make sure it made sense before they printed it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great but needs a clear instruction book.
customer_reviews.text: Well it metric, so you gotta figure that part. The paper instructions are hilarious. The lost meaning in translation. Not useful. I watched a few YouTube videos to figure it out (Thanks little 10 year old girl). I had great success on my first hatch of chickens, 9eggs and 9 hatches (my rooster is a horn dog and my 14 chickens are particularly bald). The babies stared hatching on day 19 and ended day 21. ONE THING TO NOTE—Remove the thing that corals the eggs during the last week of incubation so the chicks came get out of eggs. It is in the instructions but I did not understand instructions.
customer_reviews.author: grog

customer_reviews.title: like maybe the directions were originally in a different language ...
customer_reviews.text: Hatched 4 batches so far with only 1 egg that didn't hatch. Tricky to set up the first time, like maybe the directions were originally in a different language and some sections related to the humidity control especially didn't translate clearly, but very easy overall to operate once you figure it all out. Quiet too.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Maddox

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t recommend. Spend a little more and get a nicer one. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: This product is just ok but I wouldn’t recommend it. It’s small which is nice. Easy to clean which is nice. Not sure how well it really rotates. Makes weird noises. Temp seems all over the place. Wasn’t able to successfully hatch any eggs. Worst part is you can’t see inside. So you have no idea what’s really going on in there. Sadly I’m past the amazon return window I would return it. Not impressed. Wish I would have gotten something nicer.
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: Issues with humidity and temp control
customer_reviews.text: There were so many issues with the temperature. I ended up buying humidity gauges to see what it is since there is no indicator what so ever. It also doesn't give an accurate current temperature. So I also bought a aquarium thermometer and the temperature was literally all over the place. I constantly had to adjust it which was so frustrating. I had 5 fertile eggs and four hatched.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Orestad

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, and works as it should
customer_reviews.text: This is my very first incubator, and it is very easy to use. This incubator works exactly as it should. It comes with easy to read instructions, and holds temp well. Every couple of days you have to add water to the bottom, I had a very hard time remembering to do that. I ordered eggs online and tried it out, unfortunately I did not set it correctly because my ducks died late into incubation. The machine functions as it should, I am just inexperienced.
customer_reviews.author: Amber W.

customer_reviews.title: Great so far.
customer_reviews.text: I will update this review later, but I was able to fit 12 eggs in the tray, 6 tiny silkie eggs, three polish eggs, and three Easter eggers. Seems to maintain heat and the simple rotation mechanism works (I highly suggest trying this out for a few hours with a disposable egg, the funny smell disappears and you can double check the temperature).
customer_reviews.author: RebeccaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Have used for years, I recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this incubator for over two years and have incubated at least 7 clutches of eggs in that time, chicken, peafowl and duck. I had great results each time, always at least a 75% hatch rate, once a 100%! Just an FYI: it only fits 9 eggs (6 duck) with the auto-turner in. The 12 estimate is only without it, or maybe with bantam/quails. I live in the high (7k) desert (NM) and I just keep a 1/2 inch of water down below the entire time, and it always seems to do the trick!
customer_reviews.author: Aly

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t worked as meant.
customer_reviews.text: It was supposed to be fun and a learning experience, instead it was painful, for some reason the tray never moved, and all the little animals were just set to be dead. There’s no buttons to actually activate/deactivate anything therefore you have got to rely on the “electronic system” I’m not saying don’t buy it, but my experience was bad.
customer_reviews.author: Fredy Garcia

customer_reviews.title: For the price, it's a great value
customer_reviews.text: Bought this unit and for the price it does pretty good. Over the last 3 years I have an 80% success rate for hatching chicks, both quail and chickens. It's a great starter unit or for someone that wants to do the "egg to adult" project with younger kids or in a classroom setting. Thermometer and hygrometer on unit are a little shaky. Bought a digital thermometer/hygrometer combo for inside the unit that can be seen from the outside - helpful for accurate temps and humidity. Would recommend for first time incubators.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Sellers interested in customer service and prompt delivery.
customer_reviews.text: Just got it and am hatching quail eggs. The instructions were clear and it was easy to set. Would be nice if there were U.S. measurements as well as metric for water. Item was shipped promptly. We'll see in 18 days if I've done everything correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Things hatched I guess
customer_reviews.text: When I first got mine it had a big crack in it due to shipping which is why I took a star off. Second is when I set it up I could never get the humidity right. I suggest putting a small cup in the incubator to fill with water instead of just putting it in the bottom tray. Other than that it hatched 9 out of 19 eggs 6 of which where infertile and the rest died because of me not the incubator.
customer_reviews.author: Orabel Beadnell

customer_reviews.title: Hatched the chicks.
customer_reviews.text: Worked well and chicks just started hatching today. Directions are poorly written. I set temp and humidity then wrapped it in a towel to help with temp like the directions suggested. My kids loved watching the process and seeing them hatch.
customer_reviews.author: Family

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: We tried a small batch of bantum chickens, 4 of the 5 hatched, but the one that didn't probably wasn't fertilized. They hatched earlier than expected, started on day 17. Have to watch the water level/humidity, dried up faster than expected.
customer_reviews.author: E. D. Saubier

customer_reviews.title: Great incubator for the money
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use. I hatched 7 out of 8 eggs in n my first try. Watch a couple of YouTube videos to get a better understanding of how to properly set up and use the incubator. The instructions that come with it are not easy to understand
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So easy first time Hatcher
customer_reviews.text: Could not believe it. First time Hatcher here was so easy to use. Fool proof. I had 8 eggs and all 8 hatched!! Do not leave them too long after they hatched after 24 hours because they may get splayed leg. But other than that this is the best tool so easy
customer_reviews.author: CRayad

customer_reviews.title: Must by separate hydrometer
customer_reviews.text: I successful hatched out my fist batch. It worked great, the only bad thing is that there is no way to see the humidity level. You must purchase a separate hydrometer.
customer_reviews.author: Frances

customer_reviews.title: Excellent incubator
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter purchased this incubator for her first round of hatching baby chicks. Setup was easy and all 8 of our eggs hatched right on time. Seemed very easy to keep temp and humidity within the necessary range. Was able to fit 8 average sized chicken eggs.
customer_reviews.author: Aneil Kamath

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup and this incubator is working great
customer_reviews.text: Easy setup and this incubator is working great. i do not need to make adjustments to the temperature settings at all.
customer_reviews.author: B H.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value in a small incubator
customer_reviews.text: Great little incubator for small batches. I used them for quail eggs. Easy to set up, pretty much plug and play. I did have to cover it up to help maintain temp at 100 degrees but that's no problem. Easy to clean up, too.
customer_reviews.author: ktaylor

customer_reviews.title: Works fine. Small capacity. Very quiet when running.
customer_reviews.text: Small. Rolls eggs rather than tilts them like other incubators I have had. I watched YouTube videos rather than read the manual. Hatched 3 of 4 eggs perfectly. Probably would go for more capacity incubator next time.
customer_reviews.author: J.A. Henson

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC
customer_reviews.text: We are a new local business, and we have had basically a 100 percent success rate with these incubators. So much success with them, that we have ordered 2 more. I would highly recommend these incubators. Wish they made one that holds more eggs. We tried another incubator and it was so terrible, with minimal success rates. Hands down, this is the best.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Instructions still matter
customer_reviews.text: The instructions make no sense. I can’t figure out what they are wanting me to do or when to get ready for hatching time. There’s some bad grammar in the instructions. The parts are not labeled in the instructions. The picture examples with the instructions, well some are missing! Some instructions seem contradictory.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hatched a lot of eggs
customer_reviews.text: Thirteen eggs went into the incubator and 9 were hatched. We are working on trying to hatch a second batch now and hopefully the results will be the same.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Proud owners of three ducks
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my kids to have fun with hatching 3 duck eggs. And we was happy to find out that all three ducks hatched right on time. So this incubator worked perfectly. I would recommend this incubator to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: John T. Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gift for my grandson
customer_reviews.text: I have not used this incubator, I bought it for my grandson, for Christmas. He is very interested in incubating eggs.
customer_reviews.author: LOYCE BORDERS

customer_reviews.title: Works, but lowest in it's class.
customer_reviews.text: It did it's job but there's better one's out there with better features at the same price point. I was only able to fit 9 chicken eggs in it. The automatic egg roller is a bad design and the manual is lacking. Going through the menu I found abbreviations and settings that are not mentioned in the manual.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer ketchem

customer_reviews.title: Great little incubator!
customer_reviews.text: Great! 100% hatch rate with 3 African geese eggs! 80% hatch rate with chickens recently! Just be sure to get yourself a humidity probe monitor.
customer_reviews.author: M. H.

customer_reviews.title: This is a super easy unit to use. No fuss, no muss!
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good! We have another 15 days before chickens are born. I will report back with how well that went.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Keehl

customer_reviews.title: Works great, easy to use!!!
customer_reviews.text: Our black sex link chicks we hatched, holds temp perfectly, love the auto egg turner, just add 100ml water every other day and you golden!! Still recomend a hydrometer to keep an eye on humidity
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Hatch Rate!
customer_reviews.text: The instructions on the product are terrible and there is not an easy way to adjust the humidity. Hatch rate was 28% - 30% on two hatches I did. I followed the instructions to the letter on both without any deviation. I would not recommend this item even at the price point it is at.
customer_reviews.author: Kaycee Cornelius

customer_reviews.title: Easy incubator
customer_reviews.text: We have found this incubator to be great for our purposes. We had our first set of eggs in for incubation 8 out of 12 hatched! The temperature held steady, we just had to remember to add water for moisture. I will say the instructions that came with the incubator were pretty worthless, but it was easy enough to figure out how it went together.
customer_reviews.author: Becky Ring

customer_reviews.title: Delivered quickly.
customer_reviews.text: Thus far I am very happy, have 7 eggs in the incubator. Very easy to set up. Thank you,
customer_reviews.author: Violet Goddard

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This incubator worked great. The first time we used it 8/12 hatched the second time 10/12 hatched.
customer_reviews.author: Mona M.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I am so impressed with this incubator! So simple and easy to use. I have been extremely successful hatching button quail eggs with this I can’t believe it. Don’t hesitate!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Laguna

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected. Read the product description well.
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I expected. Cannnot see threw it very well. Does not show humidity.( need a separate gauge) temperature at top is different then where eggs are.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great, successfully hatched chickens!
customer_reviews.text: So far I am pleased with this product. We successfully hatched our first round of chickens using this!
customer_reviews.author: Initiate

customer_reviews.title: Now it works great.
customer_reviews.text: I put the wrong tray in at first. Had trouble with the lid popping off until that I should put the other tray on. Now it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Janie S. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Like your product. Am using it as I am writing this to you. YES!! Very happy with your incubator.
customer_reviews.author: John W. Miles

customer_reviews.title: Watch mother nature at work!
customer_reviews.text: first try...hatched 5 out of 6 chicks! what an experience to watch. couldn't have done it without YouTube videos as instructions are hard to read.
customer_reviews.author: AWC

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Lil egg incubator has hatched 2 sets of assorted eggs quail sillie game bird works great not much space needed would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT REGULATE TEMP
customer_reviews.text: Ordered last year, missed peafowl eggs so 2019 first year to use. The temperature control didn’t keep temp regulated went up to 105 and killed all of my babies. FURIOUS
customer_reviews.author: Sedalia

customer_reviews.title: Easy!
customer_reviews.text: Put 6 fertilized eggs in here and plugged it in. Added water every few days. 5 of the 6 chicks hatched. So simple! The only negative feedback is that the instructions are horribly translated to English.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: the electrical cord was hard to push into the unit, it should be better designed
customer_reviews.text: the unit was good, but plastic lost the temperature rapidly, had to use extra towels to keep it at set temperature, it will be better if insulated by styrofoam outside the plastic then perfect
customer_reviews.author: roy Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Really liked it was easy to use tried two home made incubators before I bought this one well worth the money very pleased at the time of the photo was Bay 20 one hatch one almost out and 4 more piped out of 7 Had a 100% hatch rate 7 0f 7
customer_reviews.author: Joey

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product. The only thing I wish it had a way to test the humidity inside. I had to purchase a separate device. It also could use a closing vent rather than one permanently open.
customer_reviews.author: Loren J.

customer_reviews.title: Instructions are a bit confusing
customer_reviews.text: Looks like a good unit, eggs have been in it for a week now, the instructions are a bit confusing to the amature egg hatcher
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: It can't regulate humidity, I've constantly had to add remove water even though I followed the instructions. It's set up is decent but the fact it fluctuates so much make it not worth buying unless you want to h hovering over it all day like me and my family have.
customer_reviews.author: christopher reed

customer_reviews.title: Great small incubator
customer_reviews.text: Great product does everything we asked it to do... just hatched 7 ducks from 2 batches.... will only hold about 6 duck eggs if they aren't too big....
customer_reviews.author: Eric Kell

customer_reviews.title: IF YOU WANT TO HATCH EGGS DO NOT BUY THIS PIECE OF GARBAGE!!
customer_reviews.text: Piece of trash. This incubator will NOT hold the temperature and with the room the same temperature it fluctuates wildly.. Between 94.1 to 101. This is an overprice piece of garbage and it killed my emu egg. Crummy. It started out fine and I have been checking it every 2 to 4 hours and it needs constant monitoring even at night. I really hate this and I wish I could get my money back plus money for my dead emu.
customer_reviews.author: LAMommy

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Very good little incubator, worked well, and very very quite, and I was amazed with the patience of this seller, I contact him plentyty times during the incubation process with questions and he answered me everything I need to know,
customer_reviews.author: c l

customer_reviews.title: Works good! We hatched 3 out of 4 eggs
customer_reviews.text: Works good! We hatched 3 out of 4 eggs. I wish it had a humidity gage however and when we received it the side was cracked.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Tanner

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I hatched out all but 1, the 1 was my fault. Really have to watch the humidity but it works!
customer_reviews.author: Paige Hagen

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Simple and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: worked well...a little confusing to figure out the humidity settings but we did. Hatched 7 new little chicks!
customer_reviews.author: ALYSSA PAOLILLO

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Working great had 2 clusters of egg hatch, bought 2nd one and also had 3 clusters of hatching quail eggs
customer_reviews.author: Ed fujiwaki

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Hatched out two guinea meets and 4 chickens with this incubator. It worked well for me.
customer_reviews.author: Di

customer_reviews.title: None of the work...just the hatching fun!
customer_reviews.text: Great incubator! We have used several. This far exceeded our expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Quincey K

customer_reviews.title: I’m very satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: Merchandise arrived in good condition and works great. It’s my first time to hatch on this machine and it gives me a great result. I’m happy for choosing this product.
customer_reviews.author: Billy Domondon

customer_reviews.title: So far very good will update on hatching
customer_reviews.text: Holds temp and humidity and rotates. Wish it held more eggs.
customer_reviews.author: connie staves

customer_reviews.title: Successfuly hatched chicken
customer_reviews.text: Gave to my daughter as a Christmas. Not too difficult to understand although the directions are obviously a translation. We have so far successful hatched 2 eggs.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Upperman

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was broken when I went to put my eggs in I only got two eggs to hatch
customer_reviews.author: Rodney Pitcher

customer_reviews.title: ... incubator and so far it seems to be working fine. Will know when eggs hatch
customer_reviews.text: Very recently received this incubator and so far it seems to be working fine. Will know when eggs hatch.
customer_reviews.author: mary steinam

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: On second batch of eggs and it's worked perfect both times. Super easy to set up and use!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Roseburrough

customer_reviews.title: good hatch rate
customer_reviews.text: 8 out of 10 eggs hatch chicks are good and healthy.
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: ... base for extra insulation and it holds the temp pretty well. I've hatched two clutches so far
customer_reviews.text: I wrap a towel around the base for extra insulation and it holds the temp pretty well. I've hatched two clutches so far. High % hatch.
customer_reviews.author: deborah

customer_reviews.title: Poor design
customer_reviews.text: This product is horrible it only hatched 40 percent of my chicken eggs. I tried 4 batches all were the same. It’s not fun seeing so many new born chicks dead with my boys there. Please don’t buy this product
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up and perfect rotation and temperature helped me ...
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up and perfect rotation and temperature helped me start a batch of mandarin ducks! I otherwise would not have gotten as far as i am now with my babies.
customer_reviews.author: Riki Nemser-Crowley

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Very simple setup, smooth design. Would be 5 stars but barely fits 9 duck eggs.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Makes perfect babies.
customer_reviews.text: I've hatched two babies so far and one is baking as we speak. So excited to make babies.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon lover

customer_reviews.title: It works great
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for the speed they fixed my problem very good customer service
customer_reviews.author: Salomon portillo

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed how easy it was to use! I plugged it and put some water in every couple of days and it worked fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good product easy to use hatched my eggs good! Good people too
customer_reviews.author: Frater Barber

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Well this incubator works as you can see from the picture! The automatic egg tuner helps sooo much. Heats easily and quickly
customer_reviews.author: Adriana

customer_reviews.title: More than an egg meets the eye!
customer_reviews.text: Great incubator! Very easy to use. Used this in my classroom . He kids loved that you could see inside and watch the hatching process!
customer_reviews.author: kjrogers76

customer_reviews.title: Holds only 6 regular sized chicken eggs.
customer_reviews.text: This can only hold 6 regular sized chicken eggs. I'm returning it!! Instructions were written by someone who obviously used Google translate. I got no idea if it works because I'm just going to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Dwayne T.

customer_reviews.title: Busy hatching
customer_reviews.text: Hatched several chicks with this model! Make sure to disinfect before each use! Otherwise chicks can get deadly aspergillosis (that’s with any incubator or brooder). Also, make sure to put metal bar (used to turn eggs) in the hole on the slide. Also remove the top platform and slide a few days before chicks are due to hatch or metal turning bar will puncture an egg or chick. Follow directions on changing temp according to days in incubator. Successful hatches!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price,  Vieiwing is minimal.
customer_reviews.text: Great incubator and easy to control humidity since the surface area of the bottom is large. I have had the temperature read low on my second thermometer on a few occasions. I lowered the preset temp to 37.8 to keep my temp closer to 99.5. The viewing is minimal but this is a set it and forget it incubator. I suggest a secondary thermometer for a while until you feel confident that the temp holds. Will see how the eggs do this round with the fluctuations.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: iTavah Egg Incubator, Digital Incubators for Hatching Eggs with Automatic Turner, 9-12 Eggs Poultry Hatcher for Chickens Ducks Goose Birds
feature_bullets: 【Universal Fit】Ideal for home use,educational activities,laboratory settings and classrooms, perfect for survivalists, small scale poultry farmers,small commercial farmers,budget-conscious poultry hobbyists those who interested in incubating dove,chicken, quail,and duck eggs.

【Newly Designed】Digital temperature control, Removable and adjustable egg trays with grille,Automatic egg turner,Automatic temperature control monitoring,Built-in water channels control humidity level,Excellent air circulation system provide reassurance of hatching success.
【Maximum Capacity】Incubator holds 9 Ordinary Chicken/Duck Eggs or 16 Pigeon/Quail Eggs.
【More Potable】As tabletop incubators go, this one is small size. if you use it,you can put it on a table.

【Warranty Guarantee】iTavah is the Authorized Seller.Unauthorized sellers can not offer or guarantee warranty.Each one of egg incubator comes with a 1-year warranty AND a 45 days money back guarantee. If you have any issue with your egg incubator,please do not hesitate to contact us - your satisfaction is paramount!
